title: Offer Digest | May
ogDescription: This Month’s Travel Offer Digest – The month of May has some great new travel offers!

tod.kvAlt: Best Summer Escape Offers of up to 4X Miles
tod.intro: Planning your next summer holiday? Enjoy the latest travel offers to earn more and redeem miles for a rewarding summer getaway!
tod.beforeQr:
Asia Miles - Offer Digests
This Month’s Travel Offer Digest – The month of May has some great new travel offers!
tod.afterQr: Screenshot QR Code and Scan in Wechat to Share

data.headline: 2X Miles
data.leadIn: Register now and travel from 5 May to 20 June 2017 to earn Double Miles when flying in Business Class, Premium Economy Class or Economy Class between Auckland and Hong Kong.
data.tip: For members residing in Mainland China, Hong Kong, New Zealand and Taiwan only

data.headline: 3X Miles
data.leadIn: Register now and travel from India to San Francisco or Los Angeles by 30 June 2017 in Business Class to earn Triple Miles.
data.tip: For members residing in India only

data.headline: 2X Miles | Extra Online Booking Bonus Miles
data.leadIn: Register now until 5 June 2017, and fly a round-trip to Europe, North America or Tel Aviv between 5 May and 5 August 2017 in Economy Class to earn Double Miles. If you book your tickets through Cathay Pacific website can enjoy 1,000 Bonus Miles.
data.tip: For members residing in Australia only

data.headline: 2X Miles | Extra Online Booking Bonus Miles
data.leadIn: Register and fly from South Africa to selected Asia destinations by 30 June 2017 in all classes to earn Double Miles. Book your tickets through Cathay Pacific website can earn up to 3,000 Bonus Miles.
data.tip: For members residing in Botswana, Kenya, Madagascar, Malawi, Mauritius, Mozambique, Namibia, Nigeria, South Africa, Zambia, Lesotho, Swaziland and Zimbabwe only

data.headline: 3X Miles | 50% discount for the 2<sup style="font-size: 75%; line-height: 1;">nd</sup> room
data.leadIn: Permeating elegance, prestige and distinction in each of their award-winning hotels, The Peninsula Hotels offers bespoke service and state-of-the-art amenities. Catering for family excursions, guests can enjoy a range of amenities and programs tailored just for junior guests that encompasses cultural and entertaining activities.
data.offerBody:
Offer
  1. Earn Triple Asia Miles by booking “Family Moments” package
  2. Exclusive benefit “Family Moments” package:
    • Daily breakfast for two
    • Eligible for 50% discount on the second connecting/ adjoining room
    • Complimentary kids menu for children (aged 12 & under) dining with parents
    • Array of amenities and programs for junior guests
    • Exclusive use of The Peninsula Stokke VIB (Very Important Baby) Products (for Suite staying guests in The Peninsula Manila only)

For detailed participating properties list, please click here.

How to Earn
  1. Make your booking of “Family Moments” package through dedicated website from The Peninsula Hotels or The Peninsula Hotels reservation toll free numbers.
  2. Quote promotional code “CXTRIPLE” when making reservations.
  3. Present your Asia Miles membership card upon check-in.
data.tandcBody:
1. The offer is valid for bookings between 16 May and 7 September 2017, and stay period between 17 May and 8 September 2017, all dates inclusive, on the “Family Moment” package rate.
  2. The “Family Moment” package is applicable for family travel, maximum of two adults and two children (aged 12 & under).
  3. This offer is subject to availability and advance reservation on the package is required.
  4. Second connecting/adjoining is subject to availability, confirmation will be advised by hotel separately.
  5. Children's meal, amenities or programmes will not be available without a valid second room booking.
  6. Additional charge may be applied and advance booking may be required for junior activities.
  7. Use of The Peninsula Stokke VIB Products is subject to availability for the Suite staying guests in The Peninsula Manila, please contact the hotel upon booking for confirmation.
  8. Blackout dates may apply. Please check at the time of making your reservation.
  9. Asia Miles will be credited to the member's account 4 to 6 weeks after each eligible stay.
  10. Bonus miles can only be earned by 1 member per room, per stay.
  11. This offer cannot be used in conjunction with any other promotional offers.
  12. Other terms and conditions for The Peninsula Hotels apply.
  13. Other Asia Miles terms and conditions apply.
data.hotelHighlight:
The Peninsula Hotels operates the most prestigious properties in ten major cities around the globe. Each award-winning hotel offers unique characteristics that reflect the local architecture, art and dynamic culture of the city. Elegantly designed rooms are also equipped with state-of-the-art in-room technology.

With every stay, each guest will enjoy unparalleled service customized to their personal needs. Families traveling together will be treated to a range of amenities and programs tailored for children and adults alike that will ensure cherished memories for all.

While you are earning Triple Miles and other exclusive benefits when staying at any participating property of Peninsula Hotels, let us introduce you to the following hotels from their portfolio this month:

The Peninsula Paris - a Palace sitting in the heart of Paris
Located adjacent to Arc de Triomphe and surrounded by some of the most famous monuments, museums and luxury boutiques in the world, the Peninsula Paris is accorded “Palace” distinction by French Tourism Development Agency, ATOUT France, delivering exceptional services and comfort while offering stunning views of the city skyline. The hotel also offers suites with private rooftop gardens where you can enjoy an intimate cocktail gathering with a panoramic view of the Eiffel Tower and other emblematic monuments in Paris.

The Peninsula Beijing - where Chinese artistry meets craftsmanship
The Peninsula Beijing is the group’s first all-suite hotel, delivering the largest standard guest rooms in the heart of China’s dynamic capital. The hotel offers a bespoke cultural programme with culinary and wellness experiences, from a visit to the most private part of the Shu Fang Zhai Temple in the Forbidden City ending with a tea-infused set lunch to an exclusive tour giving visitors an inside view of China’s rich history including the ancient art of kite-making, guided by esteemed historians from the city’s renowned universities.

data.headline: Up to 4X Miles
data.leadIn: With locations in premier cities across the globe and exotic islands, each Shangri-La brand is distinct yet provides the same home away from home hospitality.
data.offerBody:
Offer

Book the Best Available Rate to enjoy up to Quadruple Asia Miles when staying at any Shangri-La hotels, resorts* , Kerry hotels, Hotel Jen and Traders hotels.

  1. Earn Quadruple Asia Miles for 4 or more consecutive nights
  2. Earn Triple Asia Miles for 3 consecutive nights
  3. Earn Double Asia Miles for 2 consecutive nights

*Except Shangri-La Hotel, The Marina, Cairns

How to Earn
  1. Book online through Shangri-La Hotels and Resorts dedicated webpage.
  2. Please quote your Asia Miles membership number when making your reservation.
  3. Present your membership card at check-in.
data.tandcBody:
1. This offer is valid for stays completed between 1 June 2017 – 31 August 2017, inclusive, at any participating Shangri-La hotels, resorts, Kerry hotels, Hotel Jen and Traders hotels properties worldwide, except Shangri-La Hotel, The Marina, Cairns.
  2. This offer is based on the Best Available Rate.
  3. This offer is subject to availability advance reservation is required.
  4. Bonus Asia Miles will only be awarded for stays booking through directly with Shangri-La.
  5. Members must quote their Asia Miles membership number and present their Asia Miles membership card upon check-in for mileage credit.
  6. Bonus Asia Miles will be credited to the member's account within 4 to 6 weeks after the completion of each qualifying stay.
  7. This offer cannot be used in conjunction with other promotions.
  8. Other Shangri-La Hotels and Resorts and Asia Miles terms and conditions apply.
data.hotelHighlight:
Hong Kong based Shangri-La Hotels and Resorts is a leading luxury hotel group in Asia Pacific, owning over 95 hotels and resorts throughout Asia Pacific, North America, the Middle East and Europe, with over 40,000 room inventory.

While you are earning up to Quadruple Miles when staying at any participating property of Shangri-La Hotels and Resorts, let us introduce you to the latest addition to the brand:

Kerry Hotel, Hong Kong - a vibrant place buzzing with life and activity
Opened in April 2017, it is the only hotel in Hong Kong that offers alfresco dining in all of its restaurants & bar along with their comfortable and luxurious accommodations. The pleasant summer breeze and panoramic view of Victoria Harbour will let you indulge in every moment of the dining experience.

data.headline: 3X Miles
data.leadIn: TripAdvisor Travellers’ Choice Hotel Award winner Pan Pacific Hotels and Resorts offers a wide-range of relevant choices set against a modern and luxurious backdrop.
data.offerBody:
Offer
  1. Earn Triple Asia Miles
  2. Join DISCOVERY to enjoy exclusive membership benefits.
    • Extra 300 Miles
    • Member rates
    • Complimentary internet access

For detailed participating properties list, please click here.

How to Earn
  1. Book Online through the dedicated website or Pan Pacific toll free reservation numbers.
  2. Quote your Asia Miles membership number when making a reservation.
  3. Present your Asia Miles membership card upon check-in.
data.tandcBody:
1. This offer is valid for eligible stays booked and completed between 15 May and 14 August 2017, inclusive, at Pan Pacific Hotels and Resorts participating properties.
  2. This offer is only available for bookings made through the dedicated website or through the Pan Pacific worldwide toll-free reservation number.
  3. This offer is eligible for bookings made at the Best Available Rates only.
  4. Best Available Rates do not include tour operator rates, groups and packages, corporate rates, free or complimentary stays, travel industry rates, internet wholesaler rates or third-party rates.
  5. Room rates are subject to prevailing taxes, service fees and other surcharges.
  6. A minimum of 2 nights’ stay applies.
  7. Blackout dates apply and vary between properties.
  8. Reservations must be made in advance and is subject to availability.
  9. A cancellation policy applies and varies by property.
  10. This offer is not exchangeable, transferable or redeemable for cash and cannot be used in conjunction with any other promotional offers.
  11. Asia Miles will be awarded to one member per room, per eligible stay.
  12. The additional 300 Asia Miles when members join DISCOVERY programme will be credited to members’ account within one month after the promotion period ends.
  13. Bonus Asia Miles will be credited to the member's account 4 to 6 weeks after each eligible stay.
  14. Other Asia Miles terms and conditions apply.
data.hotelHighlight:
Make it a memorable summer with Pan Pacific Hotels and Resorts. With 12 awards under their belt at the TripAdvisor Travellers’ Choice Hotel Awards, Pan Pacific Hotels and Resorts offers travellers genuine hospitality and an invigorating blend of the best that the Pacific has to offer.

While you are earning Triple Miles and enjoying other special offers when staying at a Pan Pacific Hotels and Resorts property, let us introduce you to our landmark properties in Singapore and Australia – Pan Pacific Singapore and Pan Pacific Perth.

Pan Pacific Singapore - Revel in luxury 5 star hotel in Singapore
Whether for business or leisure, a stay at the Pan Pacific Singapore hotel is your assurance of world-class service and five-star luxury accommodation.

The hotel overlooks the iconic Marina Bay and has been consistently voted the World’s Leading Business Hotel by World Travel Awards. The hotel's strategic location at the gateway to the Central Business District provides easy access for business travellers, and at the same time offers a wide array of sightseeing, retail and entertainment options in the vicinity. Discover the invigorating energy of one of Southeast Asia’s most dynamic cities from the indulgent comfort of Pan Pacific Singapore.

Pan Pacific Perth – Embrace 5 star luxury hotel and signature service in Perth
Take in scenic vistas of Perth’s famous Swan River or explore the lush historic gardens of Kings Park when staying at the Pan Pacific Perth hotel in Australia. Whether you are travelling for business or leisure, the luxury 5 star hotel will offer you a refreshing and revitalising experience.

Moments away from the river and a short walk from the city’s main retail, dining and entertainment precincts, Pan Pacific Perth provides the perfect location for a relaxing and indulgent stay.

data.headline: Up to 4X Miles | Up to 10% off on rental rate
data.leadIn: With a wide-range of options in their collection, Sixt offer vehicles of all sizes from 4x4 SUVs and trucks to speedy convertibles and sports cars at an affordable rate.
data.offerBody:
Offer
  1. Earn up to Quadruple Asia Miles when you book with Sixt, for example:
    • Double Miles for 1 to 4 days’ car rental
    • Triple Miles for 5 to 6 days’ car rental
    • Quadruple Miles for a minimum of 7 days’ car rental
  2. Enjoy up to 10% off on rental rates for eligible bookings made.
How to Earn
  1. Make your booking through the Sixt dedicated webpage and include your Asia Miles membership number during reservation.
  2. Present your Asia Miles membership card at the rental counter when picking up your car.
data.tandcBody:
1. The offer is valid for bookings between 15 May and 30 June 2017, inclusive, and car rental periods between 15 May and 15 July 2017, inclusive. Latest car return by 15 July 2017.
  2. Bonus miles will be awarded to members during the promotion period according to the period of rental:
    • 2X miles for 1 to 4 days’ car rental
    • 3X miles for 5 to 6 days’ car rental
    • 4X miles for a minimum of 7 days’ car rental
  3. Bookings at long-term rates, corporate rates and truck rates are not eligible to earn miles.
  4. Retroactive miles collection is permitted for a period of six months after the rental start date.
  5. This offer cannot be combined with any other offers and is subject to change without prior notice.
  6. Asia Miles will be credited to the member’s account within 4 to 6 weeks after completion of an eligible car rental.
  7. The up to 10% off discount is subject to availability from different rental locations.
  8. All rentals are subject to Sixt standard terms and conditions.
  9. Other Asia Miles terms and conditions apply.
data.extraBody:
Founded more than a hundred years ago, Sixt is a pioneer in car rental industry, being the first company with a website and the first to accept mobile reservations. It is now operating in 105 countries with branches in over 4,000 locations, such as airports, train stations, cruise ports, and even hotels.

Wide-range of vehicles from 4x4 SUV, convertible to sports car are available at Sixt to make your journey more convenient and memorable.

data.headline: HKD10 = 4 Asia Miles | get 1 free night for 10 nights booked
data.leadIn: The world’s leading online booking website for accommodations, Hotels.com offer comfortable abodes across all categories with price guarantees# and if you book 10 nights during your holiday, get one night free^!
data.offerBody:
Offer
  1. Earn Double Asia Miles or 4 miles for every HKD10 with a minimum of HKD$3,500 spent*.
  2. Earn 500 bonus miles to Asia Miles members if it is their first time booking with Hotels.com.
  3. Get 1 free night^ for 10 nights booked.

*Or the equivalent amount in any foreign currency, excluding tax and handling fees.
^To find out more about the free night, please click here.

How to Earn
  1. Make your hotel booking via the dedicated webpage below based on your location of residence:
    • Australia
    • China
    • Hong Kong
    • Taiwan
    • Malaysia
    • Singapore
    • Thailand
  2. Please quote your Asia Miles membership number in the checkout field when making your reservation.
  3. Complete your hotel stay.
data.extraBody:
Early booking for rewarding summer vocations

Hotels.com is a leading online accommodation booking website with properties ranging from international chains and all-inclusive resorts to local hotels and B&Bs. You can also collect one free night^ for ten nights booked to have a more rewarding journey. Under Price Guarantee#, if you can find the same deal for less on a prepaid hotel, Hotels.com will refund the difference.

#For detailed Price Guarantee, please click here.
^To find out more about the free night, please click here.
data.tandcBody:
1. Asia Miles members earn miles on hotel bookings made via Hotels.com (regular miles: 2 Asia Miles per HKD$10 spent). During promotion period, Asia Miles members will receive bonus miles, (4 Asia Miles per HKD10 spent if the booking is over HKD3,500,or the equivalent amount in any foreign currency, excluding tax and handling fees) for eligible hotel stays booked between 16 May - 15 June 2017 (the “Booking Period”) inclusive and completed between 16 May - 31 July 2017 (the “Stay Period”), inclusive.
  2. For an eligible booking to be awarded Bonus Asia Miles, members must enter their Asia Miles membership number in the check-out field at the time of booking via the dedicated Hotels.com webpages.
  3. Bonus Asia Miles will be awarded for eligible bookings if the booking has not been altered or cancelled following the initial booking, once the Asia Miles member has paid in full and checked out of the accommodation booked.
  4. For the exact amount of Asia Miles earned from each booking, members can check the payment amount equivalent to Hong Kong dollars by selecting “Hong Kong Dollar” as the currency on the dedicated Hotels.com webpage. For non-Hong Kong residents, foreign currency conversions may lead to changes in amounts based on currency conversion and variations due to the applicable exchange rate, and your payments may also involve additional transaction costs depending on your banking institution.
  5. By completing an eligible booking and entering their valid Asia Miles membership number, the Asia Miles member agrees to let Hotels.com send details of its booking to Asia Miles, for the purpose of crediting miles to the member’s Asia Miles account.
  6. To receive the Asia Miles, the name for eligible booking is required to be the same as the relevant Asia Miles account.
  7. Asia Miles will be credited to the relevant Asia Miles account 6 to 8 weeks after the completion of an eligible hotel stay.
  8. In addition to Asia Miles, members who have joined the Hotels.com Rewards loyalty program may also collect Hotels.com Rewards (i.e. collect 10 nights, get 1 free) for stays at eligible Hotels.com Rewards properties in accordance with these terms and conditions. Hotels.com Rewards terms and conditions apply. Asia Miles members may earn Asia Miles on eligible bookings where the member redeems any Hotels.com Reward Free Nights but only for any residual amount paid by regular payment method.
  9. Asia Miles will be issued regardless of payment method, except for any amount paid by redeeming Hotels.com Reward Nights.
  10. All bookings are subject to availability.
  11. General Hotels.com terms and conditions apply.
  12. Other Asia Miles terms and conditions apply.

data.headline: Up to 1,000 Bonus Miles | 10% discount
data.leadIn: Located less than 20 minutes away from Pattaya City, the Cartoon Network Amazone Water Park will keep your adrenaline flowing with exhilarating rides.
data.offerBody:
Offer
  1. Single 1 Day Ticket (Adult, Child, Senior)
    • 200 bonus Asia Miles
    • 10% discount
    • Free round trip transportation from Pattaya City to the park’s location
    • Complimentary use of a locker
  2. Package*
    • 1,000 bonus Asia Miles
    • 10% discount
    • Free round trip transportation from Pattaya City to the park’s location

*Package Types

  • Family Package [2 adults & 2 children or senior]
  • Group Package [4 adults]
  • VIP Family Package [2 adults & 2 children or senior + cabana rent]
  • VIP Group package [4 adults + cabana rent]
How to Earn
  1. Purchase your single 1-Day ticket(s) / package(s) through the Cartoon Network Amazone Water Park dedicated webpage.
  2. Input your Asia Miles membership number when you make your order.
  3. Claim the 1-Day ticket(s) / package(s) at the park on the day of your visit.
data.tandcBody:
1. The offer is only valid for single 1-Day ticket(s)/package(s) purchased via website www.cartoonnetworkamazone.com/asiamiles from 15 May 2017 – 31 August 2017 (inclusive) and used from 15 May 2017 – 30 September 2017 (inclusive). The offer does not apply for the ticket purchased via other channels.
  2. Cartoon Network Amazone reserves the right to decline any bookings on the date of Cartoon Network Amazone special events which will be announced from time-to-time on www.cartoonnetworkamazone.com
  3. For both Thai and non-Thai residents, on top of regular earning of 1 Asia Mile for every THB 10 spent, the offer of 1,000 bonus Asia Miles will be rewarded to the member who purchases i) Family Package, ii) Group Package, iii) VIP Family Package or iv) VIP Group package and 200 bonus Asia Miles will be rewarded to the member who purchases single 1-Day ticket(s).
  4. For both Thai and non-Thai residents, purchase of any package(s) or single 1-Day ticket(s) will be provided with round trip transportation between hotels in Pattaya and Cartoon Network Amazone Waterpark.
  5. To confirm your bookings of Cabana and transportation, please email your booking including (1) Invoice number (2) Date of your visit (3) Your transportation pick up/ drop off point and schedule to onlineticket@cartoonnetworkamazone.com at least 24 hours in advance of your visit day. Please visit https://www.cartoonnetworkamazone.com/transportation/ for the detailed pick up/drop off point and schedule.
  6. This offer cannot be combined with any other offers and is subject to change without prior notice.
  7. Asia Miles will be credited to member’s account within 6-8 weeks after eligible ticket claimed at the park.
  8. General Cartoon Network Amazone Waterpark terms and conditions apply.
  9. Other Asia Miles terms and conditions apply.
data.extraBody:
Have a splashing summer with your favorite characters at Asia’s most trendy waterpark – the world’s first ever Cartoon Network-themed experience. Meet your favorite Cartoon Network friends, including Ben 10 and his aliens, The Powerpuff Girls, Johnny Bravo and many more.

Located less than 20 minutes from Pattaya City, the waterpark offers inclusive fun for all ages with 10 themed zones. Highlights include high-speed water roller coasters, a lazy river, Cartoonival (the world’s largest aqua playground boasting 150 different water features) and the Mega Wave pool which provides beach-inspired action. Blast down Thailand's longest water roller coasters, you can have a heart-pounding rides over 80 feet high.

data.headline: Book your next exotic adventures at Disney Explorers Lodge in Hong Kong Disneyland Resort
data.leadIn: Experience a world-class resort of premier accommodation in distinctive cultures and exciting entertainment with your beloved one at the newly opened Disney Explorers Lodge.
data.offerBody:
Complete with recreation, shopping, exquisite culinary adventures and Disney entertainment, the brand-new hotel Disney Explorers Lodge at Hong Kong Disneyland making it the perfect “staycation” for you. Book now with instant booking and confirmation.

Hotels, Car Rentals and Experiences Awards are arranged by Asia Miles Travel Services Limited (353953).
